description: Details required by Condition 18 criterion (a), (b), (c), (d), (e), (f), (g), and (i) (Design and Construction of Public Highway (Block 6)) of Phase 2B Reserved Matters Approval PP/23/06121 (Submission of reserved matters (Appearance, Landscaping and Layout) pursuant to outline planning permission ref.
